source: 你的眼睛真毒，能在这么多人中找到犯罪分子。
correct reference: Your eyes are so acute that you can find criminals in so many people.
incorrect reference: Your eyes are so poisonous that you can find criminals in so many people.
base translation: Your eyes are really poisonous, able to find criminals among so many people.
debate translation: Your eyes are really sharp, able to spot a criminal among so many people.
reason: The affirmative sides translation better captures the intended meaning of the Chinese text by using sharp instead of poisonous and a criminal instead of the criminal.
